title: Wrong link on pytorch.org
body_html:
Install on Linux through pip (python 2.7) the link for without cuda support
http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu75/torch-0.1.12.post2-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl
is the same as with cuda-7.5
http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu75/torch-0.1.12.post2-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl
which will throw an error if you want to install without cuda support.
body_text:
Install on Linux through pip (python 2.7) the link for without cuda support
http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu75/torch-0.1.12.post2-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl
is the same as with cuda-7.5
http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu75/torch-0.1.12.post2-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl
which will throw an error if you want to install without cuda support.
body:
Install on Linux through pip (python 2.7) the link for without cuda support
http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu75/torch-0.1.12.post2-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl 
is the same as with cuda-7.5
http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu75/torch-0.1.12.post2-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl 
which will throw an error if you want to install without cuda support.
